title: Support Functions for Computational Musicology
text: package contains support functions Computational Musicology University Amsterdam. details, see reference. examples functions can used practice, see course repository year.

what: Transpose chroma vectors to C — compmus_c_transpose
title: Transpose chroma vectors to C — compmus_c_transpose
text: Given key estimate, transpose chroma vectors back C.

title: Transpose chroma vectors to C — compmus_c_transpose
Transpose chroma vectors to C — compmus_c_transpose

what: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
text: use number distance measures Computational Musicology. compmus_long_distance brings together one place, along common alternative names. order support plotting, distances returned long format rather matrix format. designed convenience, speed.

title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
code: compmus_long_distance(xdat, ydat, feature, method = "euclidean")  compmus_self_similarity(dat, feature, method = "euclidean")

title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
text: xdat, ydat, dat Data frames start duration columns. feature (unquoted) column name compute distances. method character string indicating distance metric use (see Details). Default Euclidean distance.

title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
text: tibble columns xstart, xduration, ystart,   yduration, d.

title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
text: following methods supported. manhattan,citybolock,taxicab,L1,totvar Manhattan distance. euclidean,L2 Euclidean distance. chebyshev,maximum Chebyshev distance. pearson,correlation Pearson's pseudo-distance. cosine Cosine pseudo-distance. angular Angular distance. aitchison Aitchison distance.

title: Pairwise distances in long format — compmus_long_distance
text: compmus_self_similarity(): Self-similarity matrices long format

what: Match chroma vectors against templates — compmus_match_pitch_template
title: Match chroma vectors against templates — compmus_match_pitch_template
text: Compares chroma vectors data frame list templates, likely key chord profiles.

title: Match chroma vectors against templates — compmus_match_pitch_template
Match chroma vectors against templates — compmus_match_pitch_template
text: dat data frame containing chroma vectors pitches column. templates data frame name column template templates template column. method character string indicating distance metric use (see compmus_long_distance). Default cosine distance. norm optional character string indicating method pre-normalising vector compmus_normalise. Default Euclidean.

title: Match chroma vectors against templates — compmus_match_pitch_template
text: tibble columns start, duration, name,   d.

title: Normalise vectors — compmus_normalise
text: use number vector normalisation strategies Computational Musicology. function brings together one place, along common alternative names.

title: Normalise vectors — compmus_normalise
text: v numeric vector. method character string indicating normalization use (see Details). Default Euclidean norm.

title: Normalise vectors — compmus_normalise
text: following methods supported. identity,id normalisation. harmonic Harmonic mean. manhattan,L1 Manhattan (L1) norm. euclidean,L2 Euclidean (L2) norm. chebyshev,maximum Chebyshev (maximum) norm. aitchison,clr Aitchison's clr transformation. softmax Softmax.

title: Normalise vectors — compmus_normalise
text: compmus_normalize(): Normalise vectors
